parameter.value: I have no job. I used to be a nimble paladin though, perhaps one of the best. But I quitted.
I have some bows and crossbows to spare, I suppose. And some ammunition of course.
I have the normal bolts and arrows, of course, but also piercing bolts, onyx arrows and sniper arrows.
I'm not spending much time outside my house, so I can't pretend like I know how it looks like. But the name is nice.
Ah, so you have heard about my golden bow... I am very proud of it. You see, I'm the only owner of one. They are very rare.
My name is Bizre, dear |PLAYERNAME|.
The paladins guild has been empty for several years. A shame, really, to see such a nice building go wasted.
I used to be a very skilled paladin. I trained a lot at the paladins guild... when it was open, of course.
I quitted because of my back. It's not what it used to be. I suppose I'm getting old.
